Summary: Very Large Silver Sphere passed near our house in Sumter County
divs: Sighting DetailsOur family was working on remodeling a house in Sumter county Florida and we had taken a break. standing on the roof of our house, I noticed in the distance a black dot, what I suspected was a hot air balloon moving in a roughly west to east direction. We have Hot air balloons come over from time to time accept the usually move in groups (balloon rally). We watched for a few minutes as the object move directly toward us and became larger. The object appear to be a silver sphere with a black dot on the bottom. Then it moved abruptly to the left (South). The item was some distance off and must have been quite large. I though at least 50 ft in diameter perhaps larger. There was no sound of any kind that I could hear as eminating from the sphere as it continued to move south. As it moved away the object climbed and eventually we could not see it. I photographed the object with the digital camera I was using to take progress pictures of the house. I assume this is a Radar target or something else, but it was definitely not a conventional hot air balloon. I had no unusual feelings of any type. This occurence was also witnessed by my parents and my brother.
